name: Anime Con
description: Get ready for the ultimate anime extravaganza! Anime Con is a celebration of Japanese animation and pop culture. Immerse yourself in a world of cosplay, attend exciting panels, meet your favorite voice actors, and explore a bustling marketplace filled with anime merchandise.

name: Manga Discussion
description: Dive into the captivating world of manga at our Manga Discussion event. Join fellow manga enthusiasts in lively conversations about your favorite series, characters, and storylines. Share recommendations, discover new titles, and engage in a community that embraces the art of storytelling through manga.

name: Japanese Class!
description: Start your journey into the Japanese language and culture at Japanese Class! Whether you're a beginner or looking to brush up your skills, our interactive classes offer a fun and immersive learning experience. Explore the basics of Japanese grammar, practice essential phrases, and gain insights into the rich traditions and customs of Japan.

name: Cosplay Workshop
description: Unleash your creativity and learn the art of cosplay at our Cosplay Workshop. Discover the techniques behind crafting costumes, props, and makeup to bring your favorite characters to life. Join a supportive community of cosplayers, share tips and tricks, and take your cosplay skills to the next level.

name: Anime Movie Marathon
description: Immerse yourself in a cinematic journey through the world of anime at our Anime Movie Marathon. Experience a handpicked selection of captivating films spanning various genres and art styles. From thrilling action to heartwarming stories, this marathon is a must-attend event for anime fans seeking an unforgettable movie-watching experience.

name: Sushi Making Workshop
description: Get ready to roll your own sushi at the exciting Sushi Making Workshop! Join us on June 10th at the beautiful venue located at 5639 Oakwood Avenue in Irvine, CA 92620. Learn the art of sushi-making from expert chefs, explore different techniques, and create delicious sushi rolls with fresh ingredients. Don't miss this hands-on experience that will satisfy your sushi cravings and leave you with a new culinary skill!

name: Anime Convention
description: Join thousands of anime enthusiasts at the Anime Convention, a grand gathering celebrating the vibrant world of Japanese animation. Experience a weekend filled with cosplayers showcasing their intricate costumes, engaging panels featuring industry experts, exclusive merchandise, and unforgettable moments shared with fellow fans. Get ready for an unforgettable experience that captures the essence of anime culture.

name: Anime Karaoke Night
description: Join us for a night of anime-themed karaoke where you can sing your favorite anime songs! Show off your vocal talents and enjoy the energetic atmosphere filled with fellow anime enthusiasts.
address: 1234 Pacific Beach Blvd, San Diego, CA 92109
